skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: indian lip smacking food
des: This skill's purpose is to help people better understand the Indian cuisine. You can ask Alexa if Indian food has variety and if a particular ingredient is used to cook Indian food. More questions and more features are coming up in the next version. Please not this skill does not provide guidance on how to cook Indian food. This skill is only built to answer any questions people might have regarding the Indian cuisine. Please be sure to type a review for this skill. Every review will be addressed. In the coming versions every single question customers will have will be clarified using this skill.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
